duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct oversight of sales and marketing operations for a Select Service hotel.
Achieve optimal occupancy and ADR growth to maximize total revenue while meeting/exceeding hotel profit objectives.
Oversee operations of the hotel sales department including direct sales, follow-up sales, administration, hiring of staff, training, managing, and coaching.
Develop, recommend, implement, and manage the division's annual budget and the advertising, public relations, marketing, and sales plans and programs for the hotel.
Conduct outside sales calls, sales tours, and entertain clients.
Understand the content reflected in contracts and how to negotiate terms.
Maintain strong visibility in the local community and industry organizations.

education_certification.credential: At least 2 years of progressive hotel sales experience preferred; or a 4-year college degree and at least 1 year of related experience; or a 2-year college degree and at least 2 years of related experience.
